Chapter 12.1, Exercise 7

## Problem

Give the domain and range of the multivariable function:

$$f(x,y)=x^2+y^2+2$$



## Solution:

$$0≤x^2+y^2+2$$ 

$$−2≤x^2+y^2$$

$$x^2+y^2≥−2$$

$$D:{(x,y):x^2+y^2≥−2}$$

$$Domain: D:{(x,y):x^2+y^2≥−2}$$

$$f(0,0):0^2+0^2+2$$

$$f(0,0):0+0+2$$

$$f(0,0):2$$

$$R:{(x,y):[2,∞]}$$

$$Range: R:{(x,y):[2,∞]}$$
